title: Modified Unit Schema
description: Schema for modifiedunit.json files containing unit swaps/transformations applied by options

OptionId.description: ID of the option that triggers this modification

UnitId.description: ID of the original unit being modified

NewUnitId.description: ID of the new unit to swap to (optional). Required for types SwapUnit

NewProfileId.description: ID of the new profile to swap to (optional). Required for types SwapBasic, ModelSwap and ModelAdd

ReferencedItemsToRemove.description: Object mapping Items IDs to remove at certain level (statlines, rules, equipment ..)

oneOf.description: Direct reference to an item ID with additional info.
Nested references for items within a specific context

ReferencedItemsToAdd.description: Object mapping Items IDs to add at certain level (statlines, rules, equipment ..)

oneOf.description: Direct reference to an item ID with additional info.
Nested references for items within a specific context
